audiobook.description:
Author(s): Daniel Silva Narrator(s): Edoardo Ballerini

#1 New York Times bestselling author Daniel Silva delivers another stunning thriller in his action-packed tale of high stakes international intrigue.

Legendary art restorer and spy Gabriel Allon joins forces with a brilliant and beautiful master-thief to track down the world’s most valuable missing painting but soon finds himself in a desperate race to prevent an unthinkable conflict between Russia and the West. 

Silva's powerhouse novel showcases his outstanding skill and brilliant imagination, destined to be a must-read for both his multitudes of fans and growing legions of converts.

Author(s): Daniel Silva
Narrator(s): Edoardo Ballerini
<p><strong>#1 <em>New York Times</em> bestselling author Daniel Silva delivers another stunning thriller in his action-packed tale of high stakes international intrigue.</strong></p><p>Legendary art restorer and spy Gabriel Allon joins forces with a brilliant and beautiful master-thief to track down the world’s most valuable missing painting but soon finds himself in a desperate race to prevent an unthinkable conflict between Russia and the West. </p><p>Silva's powerhouse novel showcases his outstanding skill and brilliant imagination, destined to be a must-read for both his multitudes of fans and growing legions of converts.</p>
audiobook.name: The Collector: A Novel
